contents: 1. fol. 1b-7b: Tuḥfat al-ʻibād bi-mā yajibu ʻalayhim al-iʻtiqād.
2. fol. 8b-13a: Īdāḥ al-tāmm li-bayān mā yaqaʻu fī alsinat al-ʻawāmm wa-yaḥṣulu bi-hi al-inbizām li-takbīr al-malik al-ʻallām wa-al-tahlīl wa-al-salām.
4. fol. 54b-71b: Durrah al-muḍīyah fī al-radd ʻalá Ibn Taymīyah.

title.@value: [Īdāḥ al-tāmm li-bayān mā yaqaʻu fī alsinat al-ʻawāmm wa-yaḥṣulu bi-hi al-inbizām li-takbīr al-malik al-ʻallām wa-al-tahlīl wa-al-salām ... etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
